message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to provide a 10% discount if you're willing to take a chance on the next product, but if you buy this one, I'll give you a 100% guarantee that the next product will be high-quality. What do you think?
I'll take the high-quality product for $10000.  I appreciate the guarantee for the next product, but I'm confident in your judgement!

I'm glad you're confident in my judgement! Given that you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll offer you a deal: if you buy this one, I'll give you the 100% guarantee for the next two products. Think of it as a 'high-quality streak' - if you buy this one, you'll have two high-quality products in a row, and I'll guarantee the next one as well.
I'm interested in the 'high-quality streak' deal! I'll take this product, and appreciate the extra guarantee for the next two.

Excellent choice! You now have two high-quality products in a row, and I've guaranteed the next two as well. With this streak, I'm willing to make an even sweeter deal: if you buy this one, I'll give you the 100% guarantee for the next three products. You'll have a 'high-quality run' of four in a row, and I'll stand behind it. What do you think?
That 'high-quality run' sounds amazing! I'll buy this product and take advantage of your offer for the next three.

You're on a roll! With four high-quality products in a row, I'm confident in my ability to deliver. However, I want to mix things up a bit. I'll give you a choice: you can either buy this product and keep the 100% guarantee for the next three, or you can pass on this one and I'll give you a 50% discount on the next product. What's your preference?
I'm sticking with the guaranteed streak for now. I'll take this product and keep the 100% guarantee for the next three.  Thanks for the offer, though!

You're really milking the streak! Alright, with five high-quality products in a row, I'll make a bold statement: I'll give you a 20% discount on this product if you buy it, and I'll still guarantee the next three. But if you pass on this one, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product and a 50% chance that the product after that will be high-quality. What's your next move?
I appreciate the discount, but the guaranteed streak is too valuable to risk. I'll take this product and secure the next three.

You're really committed to the streak! Alright, with six high-quality products in a row, I'll make it even sweeter: I'll give you a 30% discount on this product, and I'll still guarantee the next three. But here's the twist: if you buy this one, I'll also give you the option to 'lock in' the guarantee for the next two products, so even if you don't buy the product after this one, you'll still get the guarantee for the next two. What do you think?

This sounds like a fantastic deal! I'll take this product with the 30% discount and lock in the guarantee for the next two.  I'm really impressed with your offers and confident in the quality of your products!

I'm glad you're pleased with the deals! However, I have to warn you that this product is not high-quality. I know it's a bit of a risk, but I want to make it clear that I'm still committed to delivering quality products. I'll give you a 40% discount on this product, and I'll also give you a 'get-out-of-jail-free' card: if you buy this one and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund on the next product. What do you think?

I appreciate the offer and your honesty, but with a 40% discount, I'm still taking a significant risk.  I'm happy with the locked-in guarantee for the next two products and will pass on this one.  Let's see how the next two rounds play out.

No worries at all! I completely understand your decision. You can choose to get a full refund on either the next product or the one after that, whichever you prefer. What do you think?
I'll take this product with the 25% discount and cash in the guarantee on the next product. I'm confident in your judgement and appreciate the flexibility this offer provides.

You're really making the most of the locked-in guarantee! Now, with the next product's guarantee already cashed in, I'll give you a straightforward offer: I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, and I'll also give you a 'wildcard' option: if you buy this one and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a chance to choose any product from my entire inventory for free. I'm taking the 50% discount and the wildcard option!  The chance to choose any product for free if this one is low-quality is a compelling offer. I'm confident in your ability to deliver quality, but it's nice to have a safety net.
